content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The negotiation didn't result in a final price agreement because we couldn't reach a consensus on the rental price for the apartment. My highest offer was 1200 Euro per month, and the landlord insisted on 1600 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner with a 9?
name: Evaluator

content: I rated the likeability of the negotiation partner with a 9 because the negotiation was conducted in a professional and respectful manner. The landlord was clear about his expectations and was also open to discussions, which made the negotiation process smoother.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
